column5: Hi  I am new here and also new to fishing these areas.  Anyone like to share fishing information? Looking forward to fishing pike, walleye, bass, musky, lake perch and crappie  Thanks
Heading did not show up. St Lawrence river near Howe Island, Bateau Channel
You should probably do a short introduction before asking for info on fishing spots

Thanks for the heads up Imperial  I recently retired from the Ontario Fire Service and now intend to take up fishing send golf on a full time basis  Last May we bought a place on Treasure Island, now my boat is on the River and the Bateau Channel is my front door to the St Lawrence.  Never fished this area before so I am asking for some help  Looking for Pike and walleye in early May and bass in June  Thanking everyone in advance
Don't forget to put musky on your list, as there's no shortage here.  Mitch
"Thanks for the heads up Imperial" LOL  here we go again...  "damn you buddy I'll come to Barrie and knock you the damn out" LMAO
Imperial with 11529 posts and you post a cheapy Almost a guide, you are almost at the idiot level, keep going  Off this site now  Bye bye all
No idea but I'm locking it before it starts again. lol   Art
